April 9th, 2020
This afternoon, Missouri Governor Mike Parson announced in his daily press briefing that Missouri schools shall remain closed through this school year....
April 3, 2020 Dear Sturgeon R-V School District Families and Staff: At this time, it is important that we take a moment to acknowledge the wonderful work that our...

p.a: Event: JH Honors Choir Concert @ Columbia Presbyterian Church
Event: HS Golf Meet vs Salisbury

div.p: SENIOR SPOTLIGHT! Today we are celebrating Chris Westbrook! Chris is involved in Science Club, Golf, and NAHS. Chris's favorite memory of his time at Sturgeon schools is A+ tutoring during summertime. Sturgeon is proud of you, Chris!

SENIOR SPOTLIGHT! Today's senior spotlight is Bryson Pearl! Bryson is planning to attend law school after graduation and advises younger students to get involved in school. Bryson is involved in softball, cheer, NHS, NAHS, Yearbook, and TOP. Sturgeon is proud of you, Bryson!

Reminder to call 573-687-3515 or email foodservice@sturgeon.k12.mo.us to set up food pick up for all children in The district from 0-18 free of charge.
#BLUEPRIDE

SENIOR SPOTLIGHT! Today we are celebrating Avie Smith! Avie is involved in Science Club, NHS, NAHS, Writing Club, Speech and Drama, and Tri-M. Avie says she'll never forget the friends she's made while at SHS. Sturgeon is proud of you, Avie!

We will be turning the athletic field lights on for 20 minutes at 8:20 PM (2020 military time) on May 4th to recognize and celebrate our seniors. May 4th would have been senior night for our baseball players. Please help us recognize the achievements of the Senior 2020 Class!

Sturgeon R-V School District
210 W. Patton St.
Sturgeon, MO 65284
Phone: (573) 687-3515
